text: Voltammetry is the name for a number of methods to analyse a sample, both in terms of quality and quantity. With voltammetry, the composition of a probe can be re-constructed by looking at the way electrical currents flow through it. Usually, the electrical current between two or more electrodes is varied. Voltammetry is a form of electrolysis. Category:Chemistry Category:Electricity
title: Voltammetry
